name: PROTAL RING
description:
Humans have discovered wormholes, but wormholes are very dangerous, so they explore a safe distance to travel. Explore using remote controlled drones to keep humans out of danger. Finally found many monsters living in it. Humans also wiped out the monsters to make their next expeditions safe. This game is a genre game action shooting sci-fi.

How To Play

W to move forward

A to move left

S to move back 

D to move right

Space to jump

leftclick to shoot
